scripts.build: mkdir dist && mkdir dist\js && mkdir dist\css && mkdir dist\assets && for %f in (src\js\*.js) do terser "%f" -o "dist\js\%~nxf" --compress --mangle && for %f in (dist\js\*.js) do javascript-obfuscator "%f" --output "%f" && for %f in (src\css\*.css) do cleancss "%f" -o "dist\css\%~nxf" && for %f in (src\html\*.html) do npx html-minifier-cli "%f" -o "dist\%~nxf" --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments && xcopy src\assets dist\assets /E /I /Y && copy CNAME dist
